jobDescription: Company Description: Our client is a stealth mode start up which has raised a total of $15MM in funding. They are a a machine intelligence company that’s combining novel unsupervised machine learning techniques with natural language generation and doing this with internet scale data. One-liner: This role is for a data scientist looking to contribute to core product features and key business decisions, on a team building distinctive commercial applications driven by unique machine learning algorithms.
